welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ciudad Guayana, a charming city known for its stunning natural beauty, vibrant culture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Nuestra Casona
restaurants.description: Nuestra Casona is a bbq joint located in San Félix.
restaurants.address: Avenida Guayana (Carrera Páez -  Diagonal a La Casa de la Mujer), San Félix 8051, Estado Bolívar

restaurants.name: Restaurant La Casona Grill
restaurants.description: Restaurant La Casona Grill is a steakhouse located in San Félix.
restaurants.address: Av Guayana (Calle El Gulli, frente al liceo Manuel Piar), San Félix 8051, Estado Bolívar

restaurants.name: Papa Brava Pollo's
restaurants.description: Papa Brava Pollo's is a fast food restaurant located in Ciudad Guayana.
restaurants.address: Centro de San Felix, Ciudad Guayana 8051, Estado Bolívar

restaurants.name: Granos Selectos Guayana
restaurants.description: Granos Selectos Guayana is a deli located in San Félix.

restaurants.name: Pizzería Lorenz
restaurants.description: Pizzería Lorenz is a pizzeria located in San Félix.
restaurants.address: Av. Guayana (UD-111 Sector La Unidad), San Félix 8051, Estado Bolívar
